events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering team for further processing.
A technical recruiter has been assigned to your profile and will reach out to you soon.
You have successfully passed the initial screening, and we would like to schedule a technical interview.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the technical interview later this week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 2 PM UTC.
You completed the technical interview successfully; our team will review your performance and get back soon.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 10th at 10 AM to discuss further steps.
You have completed the HR interview and met with the team; we are now preparing an offer.
We are pleased to propose an offer for the Software Engineer role. Please review and respond at your convenience.
We received your positive feedback on the offer and are glad to hear you are excited about joining us.
You have formally accepted the offer, and we are thrilled to welcome you aboard as our new Software Engineer.
Onboarding has begun with all the necessary preparations for your first day at the company.
The hiring process is now officially closed. We look forward to your contributions and growth with the team.
